newsitem.title: USA: Rexene says told not to hold special mtg.
newsitem.headline: Rexene says told not to hold special mtg.

text.p: Rexene Corp said Friday Institutional Shareholder Services Inc, which advises on issues of corporate governance, recommended stockholders reject holding a special shareholders meeting called for by Guy P. Wyser-Pratte, Wyser-Pratte & Co Inc and Spear, Leeds & Kellogg.

Rexene said that an Institutional Shareholder Services report stated, in part: "Management has hammered out the particulars of the Huntsman offer, to which the dissidents were not privy, and we believe that it has presented compelling reasons for eschewing it -- indeed, sans financing, there was never any firm offer at all. In our opinion, Rexene's board did not act abusively in its consideration of Huntsman's proposals or to the detriment of shareholders' interests."
Rexene Corp is a manufacturer of thermoplastic resins and plastic film.
